name: Ride A Cock-Horse To Banbury Cross
lyric:
Ride a cock-horse to banbury cross
To see a fine lady upon a white horse
Rings on her fingers and bells on her toes
She shall have music wherever she goes

Ride a cock-horse to banbury cross
To see a fine lady upon a white horse
Rings on her fingers and bells on her toes
She shall have music wherever she goes
